title.en: A Prayer for the Flourishing of the Non-Sectarian Teachings of the Buddha

text.en: Embodiment of the four kāyas, omniscient Lord Buddha ‘Kinsman of the Sun,’
text.en-trans: ku zhi daknyi künkhyen nyimé nyen

text.en: Amitāyus, Amitābha, supreme and noble Avalokiteśvara,
text.en-trans: tsé öpakmé pakchok chenrezig

text.en: Mañjughoṣa, Vajrapāṇi the Lord of Secrets, and Tārā who wears a wrathful frown,
text.en-trans: jamyang sangdak drolma tronyer chen

text.en: The victorious buddhas and all their bodhisattva heirs,
text.en-trans: gyal dang gyalsé sempé tsok nam dang

text.en: Seven Great Patriarchs,1Six Ornaments2and Two Supreme Ones,3
text.en-trans: té rab ché dün gyen druk chok nyipo

text.en: Eighty Mahāsiddhas and Sixteen Arhats4—
text.en-trans: drubchen gyechu neten chudruk sok

text.en: All of you who seek only to benefit the teachings and beings,
text.en-trans: ten dang dro la chik tu pen zhepa

text.en: All you great beings without exception, turn your attention towards us!
text.en-trans: kyechok sempa malü gong su sol

text.en: The supreme sage Śākyamuni spent countless aeons
text.en-trans: tubpa chok gi drangmé kalpa ru

text.en: Completing the two accumulations of merit and wisdom,
text.en-trans: sönam yeshé tsok nyi rabdzok té

text.en: To attain perfect wisdom, love and capacity. Through the power of this truth,
text.en-trans: khyentsé nüpa tar sön denpé tü

text.en: Long may the complete teachings of the Buddha continue to flourish!
text.en-trans: yongdzok gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: Khenpo Śāntarakṣita, Guru Padmasambhava and the Dharma King Tri Songdetsen,
text.en-trans: gangri jong su tubten nangwé go

text.en: Were the first to open up the land of snowy mountains to the light of Buddha’s teachings.
text.en-trans: tokmar jé dzé khen lob chögyal sum

text.en: Through the power of their aspirations and those of all the translators, paṇḍitas, vidyādharas and disciples,
text.en-trans: lopen rigdzin jebang tukkyé tü

text.en: Long may these teachings of the Buddha flourish in the Land of Snows!
text.en-trans: gangjong gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: In the treasure-palace that is the Buddha’s extensive teachings,
text.en-trans: gyachen ka yi norbü ding khang du

text.en: Lie great treasures of Dharma, the profound class of sādhanas,
text.en-trans: zabmö drubdé chö kyi ter chenpo

text.en: And the Heart-Essence, profound and vast, sparkling with brilliant light.
text.en-trans: zab yang nyingtik ö nön rabtu tser

text.en: Long may these teachings of the Buddha flourish in the Land of Snows!
text.en-trans: gangjong gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: Within the vast expanse of primordial purity and the essence of luminosity,
text.en-trans: kadak ösal nyingpö longchen por

text.en: All the phenomena of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa are perfectly complete—this pinnacle vehicle
text.en-trans: khordé chö kün ub chub tekpé tsé

text.en: Is the method for reaching the primordial stronghold of Samantabhadra.
text.en-trans: kunzang dömé gyalsar dröpé tab

text.en: Long may these teachings of the Buddha flourish in the Land of Snows!
text.en-trans: gangjong gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: The two major lineages—profound view and vast conduct—
text.en-trans: zabmö ta dang gyachen chöpé gyü

text.en: Are both complete within the treasury of instructions mastered by Atiśa,
text.en-trans: yong dzok dampé dzö nga a ti sha

text.en: The tradition of practical instructions passed on by Dromtön Gyalwé Jungné.
text.en-trans: gyalwé jungné lé ong dampé sol

text.en: Long may these teachings of the Buddha flourish in the Land of Snows!
text.en-trans: gangjong gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: The Words of the Buddha gathered in the three scriptural collections were
text.en-trans: denö sum gyi düpé gyalwé ka

text.en: Wonderfully arranged into instructions for beings of the three levels of spiritual capacity,
text.en-trans: dampa kyebu sum du lek drikpa

text.en: As the golden rosary of Kadampa teachings, with their four deities and three sets of texts.5
text.en-trans: lha chödün kadam ser gyi treng

text.en: Long may these teachings of the Buddha flourish in the Land of Snows!
text.en-trans: gangjong gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: The jewel treasury of the Kagyü teachings is a source of inspiration and blessings,
text.en-trans: dragyur marpa zhepa dorjé sok

text.en: Coming from the translator Marpa, Milarepa Shepé Dorje and the rest,
text.en-trans: jinlab jungné kagyü norbü dzö

text.en: A marvellous system of instruction from an unrivalled succession of masters.
text.en-trans: tsungmé rimjön kasol mejung ba

text.en: Long may these teachings of the Buddha flourish in the Land of Snows!
text.en-trans: gangjong gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: All the phenomena of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa are the radiance of the natural mind,
text.en-trans: khordé chö kün lhenkyé sem kyi dang

text.en: And mind itself, free from complexity, is realized as the essence of the dharmakāya.
text.en-trans: semnyi trödral chökü ngowor tok

text.en: This is the great seal, Mahāmudrā, pervading all that appears and exists throughout saṃsāra and nirvāṇa.
text.en-trans: nangsi khordé künkhyab chakgya ché

text.en: Long may these teachings of the Buddha flourish in the Land of Snows!
text.en-trans: gangjong gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: Learned masters who guard the Buddha’s teachings through explanation, debate and composition,
text.en-trans: chinang rikné do ngak zhung gyé né

text.en: On the key instructions of hundreds of texts for the outer and inner sciences, sūtra and mantra,
text.en-trans: ché tsö tsompé tubten kyong khepa

text.en: This is the Sakyapa tradition of the great compassionate teachers from the divine family of Khön.
text.en-trans: lha rik khön tön tsé chen sakyapa

text.en: Long may these teachings of the Buddha flourish in the Land of Snows!
text.en-trans: gangjong gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: The extremely profound and crucial points of the practice of Lamdré—the Path and its Fruit—,
text.en-trans: sung ngak nyengyü tsema zhiden gyi

text.en: With its four criteria of validity,6have been passed on in a whispered aural lineage,
text.en-trans: gyu lamdré bü nyamlen ché zab né

text.en: The tradition of special instructions coming from Virūpa, the powerful lord of yogins.
text.en-trans: naljor wangchuk khyechö dampé sol

text.en: Long may these teachings of the Buddha flourish in the Land of Snows!
text.en-trans: gangjong gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: Teachings of the victorious Lobzang Drakpa, skilfully combining the profound and the clear,
text.en-trans: zabmo umé ta dang nyer drelwé

text.en: By perfectly uniting the profound view of the Middle Way
text.en-trans: sang chen dorjé tekpé rim nyi lam

text.en: And the two-phase approach of the great and secret Vajra vehicle.
text.en-trans: zabsal pel khé lo zang gyalwé ten

text.en: Long may these teachings of the Buddha flourish in the Land of Snows!
text.en-trans: gangjong gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: This is the supreme and noble tradition for practising,
text.en-trans: denö sum dang gyüdé zhi yi dön

text.en: Without mistake, the essence and gradual stages of the path,
text.en-trans: yongdzok lam gyi ngowo gorim nam

text.en: Which incorporates all three piṭakas and all four classes of tantra,
text.en-trans: manor nyam su lenpé luk zang chok

text.en: Long may these teachings of the Buddha flourish in the Land of Snows!
text.en-trans: gangjong gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: The combined traditions of Butön and Jonang, the transmission of instruction and realization,
text.en-trans: dogyü zhen dang shé sol mi tsungpé

text.en: For the outer, inner and alternative cycles of the Kālacakra Tantra,
text.en-trans: chinang zhen sum dü kyi khorlo yi

text.en: Including unique explanations, not to be found in any other sūtra or tantra.
text.en-trans: lungtok kabab bu jo luk zung gi

text.en: Long may these teachings of the Buddha flourish in the Land of Snows!
text.en-trans: gangjong gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: In short, may all the teachings of the Buddha in the Land of Snows
text.en-trans: dorna shepé ka ché nam chu dang

text.en: Flourish long into the future— the ten great pillars of the study lineage,7
text.en-trans: drubgyü shingta chi dang zhijé sok

text.en: And the chariots of the practice lineage, such as Shijé (‘Pacifying’) and the rest,
text.en-trans: do ngak zung drel mengak dumé chuk

text.en: All of them rich with their essential instructions combining sūtra and mantra.
text.en-trans: gangjong gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: May the lives of the masters who uphold these teachings be secure and harmonious!
text.en-trans: tendzin zhabten tuktün gendün nam

text.en: May the sangha preserve these teachings through their study, meditation and activity!8
text.en-trans: tenpa khorlo sum gyi kyongwa dang

text.en: May the world be filled with faithful individuals intent on following these teachings!
text.en-trans: ten la depé kyebü sateng khyab

text.en: And long may the non-sectarian teachings of the Buddha continue to flourish!
text.en-trans: rimé gyalten yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: Throughout all the worlds, may war, conflict, famine and evil thoughts or actions
text.en-trans: jikten küntu maktruk mugé dang

text.en: Be eradicated entirely, so that even their names are no longer heard!
text.en-trans: duktsub samjor ming yang mi drak shing

text.en: May the minds of beings be infused with love! May signs of virtue increase throughout the environment and beings!
text.en-trans: yichen jamden nöchü getsen pel

text.en: And may an ocean of happiness and well-being pervade throughout the whole of space!
text.en-trans: dé ga gyatsö chok künkhyab gyur chik

text.en: From this moment on, may I follow the complete path of the teachings,
text.en-trans: dak kyang deng né yongdzok tenpé lam

text.en: Arouse the vast motivation of bodhicitta, and exert myself
text.en-trans: gyachen semkyé zabmo tawa la

text.en: In study, reflection and meditation upon the profound view,
text.en-trans: tö sam gompé chik tu tsönpa yi

text.en: So that I swiftly reach the ground of temporary and ultimate happiness!
text.en-trans: tral yün ten dé sa la nyur rek shok

text.en: For the sake of all sentient beings, who are as infinite as space,
text.en-trans: namkhé té tuk gyurpé semchen chir

text.en: May I engage in the activity of the buddhas and bodhisattvas,
text.en-trans: tubwang gyalsé yi ong chöpa la

text.en: Without ever feeling discouraged or falling prey to laziness,
text.en-trans: zhum dang ngen zhen lelo mepa dang

text.en: Always remaining joyful, with confidence and enthusiasm!
text.en-trans: yiché dünpé tro gé jukpar shok

text.en: May my body, my possessions and all my merits,
text.en-trans: dak gi lü dang longchö gewa nam

text.en: Contribute towards the happiness of beings—my very own mothers,
text.en-trans: ma nam dewé gyu ru gyurwa dang

text.en: And may whatever sufferings they are forced to undergo,
text.en-trans: dedak kün gyi duk kün gang chipa

text.en: All ripen directly upon me!
text.en-trans: dé kün dak la yongsu minpar shok

text.en: May all who see me, hear my voice, think of me or put their trust in me,
text.en-trans: dak ni tong tö dren dang mö jepa

text.en: Experience the most glorious happiness and virtue!
text.en-trans: kün kyang dé gé pal la chöpa dang

text.en: And may even those who insult, punish, strike or disparage me,
text.en-trans: mö dang dek tsok mi nyen drok jepa ang

text.en: Gain the good fortune to set out upon the path to awakening!
text.en-trans: tamché changchub lam gyi kalden shok

text.en: In short, for as long as space endures,
text.en-trans: dorna jisi nam ga nepa dang

text.en: And for as long as there is suffering among beings,
text.en-trans: drowé dukngal nepa desi du

text.en: May I too remain, to bring them benefit and happiness,
text.en-trans: dak kyang né té ngö dang gyüpa yi

text.en: In all ways, directly and also indirectly!
text.en-trans: pendé jepo nyi du gyurwar shak
